text:
="preserve">Vasil Fyodaravich Yakusha (, 30 June 1958 – 24 November 2020) was a Belarusian rower. He competed for the Soviet Union where he won a silver medal in the 1980 Summer Olympics and a bronze medal in the 1988 Summer Olympics. He was born in Kiev, Ukraine.
Yakusha died on 24 November 2020 at the age of 62.
